game.name: RuneScape: Dragonwilds
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: On RuneScape’s forgotten continent of Ashenfall, dragons have awoken. Gather, build, skill and craft to survive in this co-operative (1-4) survival crafting game. Only by mastering survival and uncovering ancient secrets can they hope to slay the Dragon Queen—alone or with allies.

reviewHighlights.text: Requires Epic Games account to play on Steam, with my Steam friends. Ugh. When will these bastards stop forcing this upon us?
Please be aware that playing this game requires an Epic Games account, as I understand this is a deal breaker for many people. This is not advertised...
